speaker: MAKI
dialogueText: Hey human, you must be researcher #115.

speaker: MAKI
dialogueText: Hmmm. Zero is right, Earthlings are truly interesting creatures. You seem to have learned a lot in this short period of time already.

speaker: MAKI
dialogueText: I’m researcher #008 but you can call me Maki. I’ll add another category of word to your [walkie talkie] for you.
